NK040(thi)039:1: lhag ma chad bstan gtor 'bul snod rnams kha bub pa'i steng rgya gram byas pas mnan la /
NK040(thi)039:3: grub thob gcod kyi brgyud pa /
NK040(thi)039:4: yi dam chos skyong rnams kyi bden pas gnod byed
NK040(thi)039:5: dam sri rgab 'dre mi min mi ru bardzuba mgo
NK040(thi)039:7: bka' dang dam la mi gnas pa thams cad gtor gzhong ri rab 'bar ba'i 'og tu khug cig /
